fail_503_service_unavailable.description: Failure: UAS replies 503 Service Unavailable to INVITE (UAC sends ACK).

fail_404_not_found.description: Failure: UAS replies 404 Not Found to INVITE (UAC sends ACK).

fail_603_decline.description: Failure: UAS replies 603 Decline to INVITE (UAC sends ACK).

fail_487_request_terminated.description: Failure: UAS replies 487 Request Terminated to INVITE (UAC sends ACK).

fail_486_busy_here.description: Failure: UAS replies 486 Busy Here to INVITE (UAC sends ACK).

fail_timeout_no_response.description: Failure: Timeout waiting for provisional/final response (UAS stays silent).

fail_canceled_call.description: Failure: Caller cancels during ringing. UAS replies 200 to CANCEL and 487 to original INVITE.

fail_busy_call_after_ringing.description: Failure: Callee rings then returns 486 Busy Here.

fail_wrong_183_then_180_order.description: Failure: Non-standard provisional order (183 then 180). Call connects but ringback may be absent.

success_183_with_sdp_then_200.description: Success: 183 Session Progress with SDP (early media) then 200 OK.

success_g711a_pcma.description: Success: Call using codec G.711 A-law (PCMA).

fail_amr_codec.description: Failure: Call using AMR codec with octet-align.
